news.title: Indigo Dyeing Workshop
news.description: Join us for an indigo dying workshop with our very own dye artist Sarah Broomfield. The activities of the workshop include learning about different cultures' indigo dying practices, creating various patterns in your fabric, how to prepare a natural indigo dye vat, and
your fabrics to get brilliantly varied shades of blue!
news.creator: Sabira Duishebaeva

news.title: Valentine's Mask Designing
news.description: Design your own mask using 3D printing and Silhoutte Cameo. February 12, from 1-3PM in TAD Building (B012)
news.creator: Sabira Duishebaeva

news.title: Intro to Vinyl Cutter
news.description: Learn how to make stickers using Vinyl Cutter. November 13, from 1-2PM in TAD Building (B012)
news.creator: Sabira Duishebaeva
